name: My Girls’ Secrets
description:
Game Overview
This is an enjoyable game that will take you into a world full of mystery and surprises. In the game, you will unlock the emotional codes of charming girlfriends, exploring their dreams and secrets together. Each level will reveal a new story segment, allowing you to understand these girls' lives better. Whether challenging your puzzle skills or enjoying wonderful stories, this game will bring you endless fun and surprises. Through interacting with the girls, players will experience a unique gaming experience while enjoying emotional stories and wonderful visual effects. This game will provide players with a unique puzzle adventure, immersing them in a magical and mysterious game world.

Key Features
Meet multiple girls with distinct attributes! ❤
♥CG gallery mode♥
